title: [Question] Does wasm support work only via UNO?
body: I cant find native lib for skiasharp in main solution, just android ios macos and etc. I am trying to include libSkiaSharp.a, but I cant create SKCanvases in wasm and webgl. Is it real at all?

comments.author: Gillibald
comments.body:
The native bits can be used via https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.WebAssembly/2.88.0-preview.145
You still need https://www.nuget.org/packages/Uno.Wasm.Bootstrap/ to set up Emscripten and the Mono runtime etc.
The last step would be creating a canvas and use that as a surface to render on. In the end, you just have Skia in the browser. The glue code is up to you.

comments.author: dr-vij
comments.body: Thank you for the answer! I am trying to connect SkiaSharp to Unity 3d WebGL wasm, it works on standalone and my only problem is webassembly. I didn't try to use uno wasm bootrsrap yet, thank you so much for this direction. I will try to figure out how to use it

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I am also in the process of adding WASM support for Blazor apps: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/1811

Are you trying to get a wasm build without any uno/blazor/framework?

comments.author: dr-vij
comments.body: Yes, I have some problems with understanding of replacement of dynamic linking cause unity wasm does not support it. But unfortunately I have no success with it yet. I am doing this out of duty, I think skia has fantastic potential for texture processing in gamedev.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
The native asset for wasm is a static lib. I am not very familiar with the way unity does things, but I have different builds of skia in the nupkg depending on the version of Emscripten being used.

Does unity have docs on adding native deps on wasm?

comments.author: dr-vij
comments.body:
they do!) https://docs.unity3d.com/Manual/NativePlugins.html
they use v1.37.27 Emscripten for Unity 2018-2020, and they updated to 2.x version in 2021 unity as I know

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I don't see any direct links with native and WASM in those docs. I don't think that SkiaSharp is the place to ask about Unity as I am not sure many of the developers here are using unity.

I would maybe suggest asking on the unity forums. However, I can say that SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.WebAssembly has 2.0.5 - 2.0.23 builds of libSkiaSharp that you can download and use directly.
